caption.p: Disproportionate magnitude of COVID-19 mortality on Blacks/AA in selective states and county, 9â€“13th April 2020. Notes: The point estimates on the line indicates the burden of COVID-19 mortality in the Black/AA communities in these geographic locales. As per mid-April 2020, the COVID-19 disproportionate burden of dying was outstanding in Wisconsin, Michigan and Illinois (mid-western states).
